item.title: Tate brothers allowed to leave Romania for US
item.description: The influencers had been banned from travelling out of Romania for more than two years.

item.title: North Korea has sent more troops to Russia, South's spy agency says
item.description: The reports of a new deployment come after Pyongyang was said to be suffering heavy losses in the Kursk region.

item.title: Israel confirms Hamas handed over hostages' bodies as Palestinian prisoners released
item.description: It was the last exchange of the Gaza ceasefire deal's first phase, leaving questions over what happens next.

item.title: Gene Hackman and his wife Betsy Arakawa found dead at their home
item.description: Local police said they didn't believe any foul play was involved in the death of the couple, found alongside their dog.

item.title: Why are the Tate brothers heading to the US?
item.description: Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan have left Romania, where they were previously under a travel ban.
